long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension is designed to make using ChatGPT more efficient and user-friendly by allowing users to save and manage past responses. With this tool, users can easily store ChatGPT's previous answers and load them into the input box as references for future interactions. This feature helps provide better context for ChatGPT, leading to more accurate and relevant responses.

Additionally, the extension allows users to edit the reference content before submitting it to ChatGPT, enabling them to guide the AI in generating answers that are more tailored to their needs. By offering streamlined reference management and customizable guidance, this extension significantly enhances the overall ChatGPT experience, making it a must-have for anyone seeking to improve their productivity and interaction quality with the AI.
